TITLE: Reset Your Password
TEXT_1: We received a request to reset your password for your {app_name} account.
TEXT_2: If you made this request, click the button below to reset your password.
TEXT_3: This password reset link will expire in {expirationTime} minutes for security purposes.
TEXT_4: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
